name: Alterhavoc
description:
One day, a meteorite falls on Earth, causing monsters and putting the world in its most apocalyptic state, so a group has created a secret base and formed an organization called Heaven Diversion to defeat enemies that threaten humanity and restore the nature of the world to normal.
Features:
- Eliminate monster caused by disasters
- Find minerals that will buff the player stats
- 2 playable character
- 12 monsters (9 normal + 3 boss)
- 18 weapons (6 melee, 6 range, 6 etc.)
- can combine into 9 op weapons
- inventory system that can rearrange item to get extra buff
